name: Pantry Quick Start Feature Test
description: Tests whether quick-start pantry feature improves time-to-first-recipe

treatment.name: Quick Start Enabled
treatment.description: Users see 'Use My Pantry' button and quick-select chips
treatment.hypothesis: Quick-start reduces friction and increases conversion by 25%

primary.name: Time to First Recipe
primary.description: Time from page load to recipe generation (seconds)

secondary.name: Recipe Generation Rate
secondary.description: % of visitors who generate at least one recipe

secondary.name: Pantry Quick Start Usage
secondary.description: % of users who use quick-start vs. manual entry
